Algiers University[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667689026598{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”SPRowFull”]Professor of surgery, Algiers University Faculty of Medicine

Head of the Department of HPB surgery and Liver Transplantation

Pierre and Marie Curie Cancer Center in Algiers, Algeria.

President of the Algerian Society of Surgery, 2018-2022

He is a professor of surgery at the University of Medicine of Algiers. He is the head of the department of hepato-bilio-pancreatic and digestive surgery and liver transplantation and the coordinator of the living donor liver transplant program in Algiers and member of the scientific council of the National Agency for Organ and Tissue Transplantation.

Prof Kamel Bentabak is the President of the Algerian Society of Surgery and member of the Algerian Society of Organ Transplantation. He is also a member of other international associations including the French Academy of Surgery, the French Association of Surgery, the French Association of Hepato-bilio-pancreatic Surgery and Liver Transplantation and the Pan Arab Society of Liver Transplantation.

He has participated in several local and international works and presented more than two hundred papers at national and international conferences and has published in national and international journals.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
